DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact different type intervention physical activity level co-morbidities woman worker age 40 50 year . Method : A total 195 sedentary woman age 40 50 year agree participate randomized one follow intervention : GI = Control ( n = 47 ) , GII = Individual counseling ( n = 53 ) , GIII = Counseling group ( n = 48 ) ; GIV = physical training set ( n = 47 ) . Were evaluate : Physical Activity level ( steps number evaluate pedometer ) , quality life ( SF-36 ) , body composition ( BMI , waist circumference bioelectrical impedance ) clinical variable ( plasma glucose blood pressure ) .
DOC.brief_title: Change Physical Activity Levels Women Working Place
DOC.detailed_description: Protocols Randomization subject : Subjects randomize 4 group : control group ( GI ) , individual counseling ( GII ) , group counseling ( GIII ) aerobic train set ( GIV ) . The protocols intervention describe detail : GI - Control : Comprising session 15-20 minute duration . It take place guideline physical activity , deliver manual general information physical activity . GII - Individual counseling : Consisting three session within maximum period 3 month . We conduct counseling , aim increase physical activity , aim raise least 2000 step first week monitoring . Furthermore , discuss importance physical activity , overcome barrier physical activity target agree party . The pedometer give along diary record number step return last session . GIII - Group Counseling : The counseling conduct group ( 10-12 individual ) 6 session weekly interval , two session fortnightly . Each session last 60 minute . The advice aim behavioral change use follow approach : advantage disadvantage behavior change , overcome barrier physical activity , self-monitoring physical activity use pedometer set goal ( number step / day ) short term case relapse ( accomplish represent ) besides living practice . As GII goal raise step daily , main focus physical activity leisure time transport . GIV - Programmed Aerobic Training : The fitness program hold two time per week individual group three session last 40 minute perform treadmill . All intervention last 12 15 week carry time commencement work lunch work hour .
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy ( serious chronic disease ) , sedentary ( less 60 minute aerobic physical activity per week schedule ) , employee HC / FMUSP age 40 50 year . Perform type pharmacotherapy weight reduction , BMI > 45 kg/m2 functional limitation would prohibit execution hiking .
